trans-unit.source: Represents the textual content of grammar elements defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)에서 정의 된 문법 요소의 텍스트 콘텐츠를 나타냅니다. [음성 인식 문법 사양 (SRGS) 버전 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The SrgsText class represents the text found within a set of SRGS element tags.
trans-unit.target: SrgsText 클래스 SRGS 요소 태그 집합 내에 있는 텍스트를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object is constructed with a <xref:System.String> parameter, a SrgsText object is created with its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> property initialized to the value of that parameter.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>개체로 구성 되며는 <xref:System.String>SrgsText 개체를 만든 매개 변수를 해당 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A>속성의 매개 변수 값으로 초기화 합니다.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> object is then added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> collection on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class.
This is the default constructor for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class.
trans-unit.target: 이것은 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText>클래스</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> 에 대 한 기본 생성자

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class, specifying the text of the instance.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"> </xref> 클래스 인스턴스의 텍스트를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value used to set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text*> property on the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 값을 설정 하는 데 사용 된 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text*>속성에는 <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"> </xref> 인스턴스.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text contained within the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class instance.
trans-unit.target: 내에 포함 된 텍스트를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"> </xref> 클래스 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The text contained within the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> instance.
An attempt is made to set Text to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 설정 하려고 시도 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.
